title: AJAX: Write a script that addresses a list of linked articles. The AJAX script should display the largest img from each linked article's body field.
snippet:
Write a script that addresses a list of linked articles. The AJAX script should display the largest img from each linked article's body field.

This script needs to be done ASAP. Can you write it today or tomorrow? I can integrate it into Drupal if you show me how do properly deal extract the image src from the data object that jQuery returns.
